text: Badagry Heritage Museum is a museum in Badagry town of Lagos, Nigeria. It is also known as Black Heritage Museum Badagry. The museum was built in 1863.https://www.premiumtimesng.com/entertainment/125838-badagry-heritage- museum-experiences-high-patronage.html == References== Category:Lagos Category:Museums Category:Buildings and structures in Africa Category:1863 establishments Category:19th-century establishments in Africa
title: Badagry Heritage Museum
